Test Name: Quantitative Real-Time PCR (qPCR) for Herpesvirus 7 (HHV-7) DNA
Specimen Type: Whole blood, plasma, cerebrospinal fluid (CSF), or tissue biopsy
Purpose: Detection and quantification of HHV-7 DNA in clinical specimens
Container: EDTA tube for blood; sterile container for plasma/CSF; tissue biopsy in viral transport media
Equipment: Real-Time PCR instrument (e.g., ABI 7500 or Roche LightCycler)
